headline: Lone Star Nears Deal to Buy Plastic Parts Maker Hillenbrand
summary: The private equity firm could announce a purchase of Batesville, Indiana-based Hillenbrand as soon as this week, according to the people, who asked not to be identified discussing confidential information.  Shares of Hillenbrand closed at $26.49 Tuesday in New York, giving the company a market value of about $1.87 billion.  Bloomberg News reported in August that Hillenbrand has been exploring a sale.

headline: Free-From Food Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring Alpro, Conagra, Danone, Doves Farm Foods, Dr. Schar, Ener-G Foods, General Mills, GreenSpace, Hain Celestial, Mondelez
summary: The Global Free-From Food Market is poised for significant growth, from USD 101.34 billion in 2024 to USD 293.46 billion by 2033, driven by a CAGR of 12.54% from 2025 to 2033. This surge is fueled by increasing consumer awareness of health and nutrition, a rising demand for allergen-free foods, and a shift towards cleaner labels. headline: General Mills Highlights Growth Initiatives at Investor Day
summary: MINNEAPOLIS, October 14, 2025--General Mills, Inc. (NYSE: GIS) executives today provided investors and analysts an update on its strategic priorities and plans to accelerate growth at its Investor Day at the company’s world headquarters in Minneapolis. Chairman and Chief Executive Officer Jeff Harmening, Chief Financial Officer Kofi Bruce, and other General Mills executives outlined the company’s key growth initiatives focused on driving remarkability across its global brands.
